publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1914.2 Ms Wendy Alexander: Tourismâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1914) in the name of Mr David Davidson, leave out from "notes" to end and insert "welcomes the actions being taken by the Executive to assist the tourism industry to recover from the effects of foot-and-mouth disease and supports its commitment to work with the relevant agencies including visitscotland and the industry to prepare and implement an appropriate and effective strategy to ensure the future growth of the industry." Supported by: Mr Alasdair Morrison*
